alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 1:21PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Routt County through 145 PM MDT... At 120 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yampa, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Routt County, including the following locations... Phippsburg. This includes Colorado 131 between mile markers 36 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin
